articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Cognitive decline linked to ultraprocessed food, study finds
articles.description: Eating ultraprocessed foods could set you on the road to cognitive decline, a new study revealed.
articles.content:

articles.title: Viktor Bout's attorney says prisoner swap with Griner and Whelan would be 'fair trade.' Hear why - CNN Video
articles.description: The US has proposed a swap of convicted Russian arms dealer Viktor Bout for detained Americans Paul Whelan and WNBA star Brittney Griner to Russian government officials. CNN's John Avlon speaks to Bout's attorney on the likelihood of Russia making the trade.

articles.author: Rob Picheta and Vasco Cotovio, CNN
articles.title: Grain ship departs key Ukrainian port for first time since early days of war
articles.description: The first ship carrying grain under a UN-brokered export deal left the Ukrainian port of Odesa on Monday, raising hopes that a global food supply crisis caused by Russia's invasion can be eased.
articles.content: (CNN)The first ship carrying grain under a UN-brokered export deal left the Ukrainian port of Odesa on Monday, raising hopes that a global food supply crisis caused by Russia's invasion can be eased.… [+3820 chars]

articles.author: Darya Tarasova and Larry Register, CNN
articles.title: Former high-level Russian official who left Putin's government reportedly hospitalized
articles.description: Former high-level Russian official Anatoly Chubais is in a European hospital suffering from symptoms of Guillain-Barre syndrome, a neurological condition, according to prominent Russian journalist and TV personality Ksenia Sobchak.

articles.title: 2 dead in the McKinney Fire in Northern California, the state's largest blaze this year
articles.description: Two people were found dead inside a vehicle that burned in the path of the McKinney Fire, the Siskiyou County sheriff's office said.

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: All eyes turn to Sinema as Democrats face a week that could transform Biden's presidency
articles.description: Democrats this week have the chance to validate their monopoly on political power in Washington, create a legacy of true significance for President Joe Biden and even boost their hopes in daunting midterm elections in three months.
